languages.text: "Или у {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} бывают нервные срывы... Или ваша ручная эльдарка прямо сейчас говорит с теми игровыми фигурами, шерин. Признаться, мне не нравится ни один из вариантов. Может, она окончательно сошла с ума, когда предала вас? И настало время избавить ее от мук помешательства?"

traits.locale_text: "Или у {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} бывают нервные срывы... Или ваша ручная эльдарка прямо сейчас говорит с теми игровыми фигурами, шерин. Признаться, мне не нравится ни один из вариантов. Может, она окончательно сошла с ума, когда предала вас? И настало время избавить ее от мук помешательства?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"
languages.original_text: "Или у {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} бывают нервные срывы... Или ваша ручная эльдарка прямо сейчас говорит с теми игровыми фигурами, шерин. Признаться, мне не нравится ни один из вариантов. Может, она окончательно сошла с ума, когда предала вас? И настало время избавить ее от мук помешательства?"

I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «O bien los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} pueden tener una crisis nerviosa... o su mascota Aeldari está manteniendo una conversación con las piezas de ese juego, shereen. He de confesar que no me gusta ninguna de las dos opciones. Igual enloqueció del todo cuando le traicionó y ha llegado la hora de liberarla del tormento de su locura...».
languages.original_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"

traits.locale_text: «O bien los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} pueden tener una crisis nerviosa... o su mascota Aeldari está manteniendo una conversación con las piezas de ese juego, shereen. He de confesar que no me gusta ninguna de las dos opciones. Igual enloqueció del todo cuando le traicionó y ha llegado la hora de liberarla del tormento de su locura...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}が神経衰弱に陥る可能性があるか…あなたのお気に入りのアエルダリがここで遊戯盤の駒と会話をしてるかのどちらかね、シャリーン。正直言って、あたしはどちらの選択肢も好きじゃない。あなたを裏切った時、彼女は完全におかしくなったんじゃない？そして、狂気の苦しみから彼女を解放する時が来たのかも？」
languages.original_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}が神経衰弱に陥る可能性があるか…あなたのお気に入りのアエルダリがここで遊戯盤の駒と会話をしてるかのどちらかね、シャリーン。正直言って、あたしはどちらの選択肢も好きじゃない。あなたを裏切った時、彼女は完全におかしくなったんじゃない？そして、狂気の苦しみから彼女を解放する時が来たのかも？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “要么是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}也会精神崩溃……要么是你的艾达灵族宠物正在和那些棋子说话，亲爱的。我必须承认，无论是哪种，我感觉都不太妙。或许她在背叛你的时候就彻底发了疯？或许现在是时候让她从精神错乱的折磨中解脱出来？”
languages.original_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"

traits.locale_text: “要么是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}也会精神崩溃……要么是你的艾达灵族宠物正在和那些棋子说话，亲爱的。我必须承认，无论是哪种，我感觉都不太妙。或许她在背叛你的时候就彻底发了疯？或许现在是时候让她从精神错乱的折磨中解脱出来？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Soit les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} sont sujets aux crises de folie... soit votre petite Aeldari est en train de parler à ces pions, shereen. Je dois avouer que de ces deux options, aucune ne me plaît. Peut-être qu'elle est devenue complètement folle quand elle vous a {mf|trahi|trahie} ? Et qu'il est désormais temps de la libérer du tourment de la démence ? »
languages.original_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"

traits.locale_text: « Soit les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} sont sujets aux crises de folie... soit votre petite Aeldari est en train de parler à ces pions, shereen. Je dois avouer que de ces deux options, aucune ne me plaît. Peut-être qu'elle est devenue complètement folle quand elle vous a {mf|trahi|trahie} ? Et qu'il est désormais temps de la libérer du tourment de la démence ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Entweder können auch {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} einen Nervenzusammenbruch erleiden ... oder Euer ergebener Aeldari unterhält sich gerade mit den Spielfiguren, Shereen. Keine der beiden Optionen sagt mir sonderlich zu. Vielleicht ist sie völlig durchgedreht, als sie Euch verraten hat? Und es wird Zeit, sie von den Qualen ihres Wahnsinns zu befreien?"
languages.original_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Entweder können auch {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} einen Nervenzusammenbruch erleiden ... oder Euer ergebener Aeldari unterhält sich gerade mit den Spielfiguren, Shereen. Keine der beiden Optionen sagt mir sonderlich zu. Vielleicht ist sie völlig durchgedreht, als sie Euch verraten hat? Und es wird Zeit, sie von den Qualen ihres Wahnsinns zu befreien?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ya bu {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} sinir krizi geçiriyor ya da... Senin şu evcil Aeldari, şu anda taşlarla sohbet ediyor şirinim. İtiraf etmem gerekir ki her iki seçenek de hoşuma gitmedi. Sana ihanet ettiğinde aklını tamamen yitirmiş olmasın? Hem sence onu deliliğin eziyetinden kurtarmanın zamanı gelmedi mi?"
languages.original_text: "Either {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} can have a nervous breakdown... or your pet Aeldari is having a conversation with those game pieces right now, shereen. I must confess I don't like either option. Perhaps she went completely crazy when she betrayed you? And it's time to free her from the torment of insanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Ya {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g} sinir krizi geçirebiliyorlar ya da... Evcil Aeldari'n, şu anda o oyun parçalarıyla sohbet ediyor şirinim. İtiraf etmem gerekir ki her iki seçenek de hoşuma gitmedi. Belki sana ihanet ettiğinde aklını tamamen yitirmiştir, ha? Hem onu deliliğin eziyetinden kurtarmanın zamanı gelmedi mi artık?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
